data.text: There’s no such thing as too much. #TooMuch with @marshmellomusic and Imanbek is out now. Video tomorrow. https://t.co/lxaNddUh5N https://t.co/LD58emLkGs
NUMBER ONE!! 🎉🍾🙏🏾Thank you for supporting #BADHABITS https://t.co/L8BLG31QeR

It's been a great time working with @GwenStefani @JohnLegend @BlakeShelton @KellyClarkson and their incredible teams! Thank you for having me! Tune in tonight and catch the last episode of knockouts! @NBCTheVoice #TheVoice https://t.co/UoEkd48ymB
🙌🏾 #TheVoice https://t.co/1Zjy4CWssi
Who’s ready for another great night of Knockouts tonight??  Our MegaMentor @usher and I are ready for @NBCTheVoice!  Show #TeamLegend your love! https://t.co/WEHUA9fn5H
When Gwen asks you to dance... you dance 😂 I’m back on @NBCTheVoice tonight! #TheVoice #VoiceKnockouts https://t.co/Ughb8sacZE
Thanks for the welcome back @JohnLegend! I’m excited to work with all of your artists @GwenStefani @KellyClarkson @BlakeShelton! @NBCTheVoice #VoiceKnockouts https://t.co/kMFNBCn333
Tonight! @NBCTheVoice #TheVoice https://t.co/emR5Jy6yEr

As you can tell from the deeply joyous opening number, Jingle Jangle is the kind of movie musical we all could use right now.

Now on Netflix! https://t.co/0k2J9mfGip
Watch the “This Day” lyric video with @kianalede & prepare for the magic! #JingleJangle is out tomorrow on @Netflix. https://t.co/BPJX8F4hN7

I’ll be on @TheEllenShow today talking about how my @UshersNewLook Foundation is helping transform the lives of youth and helping to develop passion-driven, global leaders. Don’t miss it. https://t.co/Z7Xyzmfhj5
See you next week @NBCTheVoice! https://t.co/hf5M1kBTms

I am proud to have teamed up with @JamesJeanArt for the #ShowmetheSigns exhibition and benefit auction, with 100% of the proceeds going to the @AAPolicyForum #SayHerName campaign. Bidding on my protest sign by James Jean opens today at @theartfizz. https://t.co/KtMTOELRzx https://t.co/NB13LSCAD3
Tune in tonight at 10pm ET/PT to @OWNTV for my mom’s story on #BehindEveryMan. You don’t want to miss it. Love you mom! https://t.co/9jH8Mm4fFT

“Jingle Jangle: A Christmas Journey” is coming to @Netflix November 13.  The song I did for the soundtrack “This Day” feat. @KianaLede out now. #JingleJangle https://t.co/byWWw8TSxb

The US Election is 1 month away, and deadlines to register are quickly approaching! Are you registered to vote? Check now, and you could win an exclusive dance lesson from my choreographer, courtesy of @GlblCtzn & @HeadCountOrg! #JustVote https://t.co/rAeDS2vvH1 https://t.co/eimapGr3mh
